data.text: @cbcnewsbc The government says don’t need to wear masks during a global pandemic with an airborne virus. Are all the people complying and removing them the sheeple now?
@kuasikk @cbcnewsbc Yeah, a little bit. Maybe I will keep wearing until next week.
@sterling_nacho @cbcnewsbc Careful who you bully, someone might decide to remind you.

@DireDire_Docks @cbcnewsbc Discredit Bonnie Henry? You mean the one who fires healthcare workers while she pulls in $380,000 per year plus an undisclosed amount for book deal. She has lost all credibility.
@ScottSmithJr2 @cbcnewsbc So that's a no then. Next time you want to discredit professionals in their field, come back with peer reviewed studies from credible sources. Stop wasting space please.
@cbcnewsbc I haven't been sick yet and I will do everything I can to not get sick in the future. So I'll do what is working. Masking up.
@cbcnewsbc Ok, I'll come back to Canada in one month. Hopefully stupid border testing will be gone too.
